vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.Deposit (patch_9.sol#16-22):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_9.sol#19)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_9.sol#20)
